docna.cdata!:
Tanzania - Highway Maintenance Project :
            Credit 0507 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Tanzania - Highway Maintenance
            Project : Credit 0507 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Tanzania - Program Loan : Loan 1063 - Loan
            Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Tanzania - Program Loan : Loan
            1063 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The project comprises the first stage of
            the Borrower's primary road maintenance program and
            also includes a study of the road transport industry. The
            two areas with the highest priority of the four into which
            the country has been divided were selected for inclusion in
            this stage of the program. Over a four year period 3,300 km
            of primary roads in these two areas will be rehabilitated
            and maintained.
